# ChatGPT Pixel Art Props - Round 2

Great work on the first batch! The scales, quill, and document look perfect. Now I need a few more courthouse/legal props in the exact same style.

## Same Style Rules (Reminder)
- **LPC pixel art style** - top-down 3/4 RPG view
- **1-pixel dark outline** around all shapes
- **Limited palette** - 12-20 colors max per sprite
- **NO anti-aliasing** - hard pixel edges only
- **Transparent background** (PNG)
- Match the style of the scales/quill you just made

---

## Props Needed

### 1. Gavel (Judge's Hammer)
**Dimensions:** 32x32 pixels

A wooden judge's gavel - the hammer used to call order in court.

**Must include:**
- Wooden mallet head (rectangular, dark wood)
- Wooden handle
- Simple wood grain texture (2-3 pixel lines)

**Pose:** Angled as if lying on desk, handle pointing bottom-right

**Colors:**
- Dark wood: #8B4513, #654321, #3E2723
- Wood highlights: #A0522D, #CD853F
- Outline: #1A1A1A

---

### 2. Gavel Sound Block
**Dimensions:** 32x32 pixels

The small circular/octagonal wooden block the gavel strikes.

**Must include:**
- Circular or octagonal wooden disk
- Slightly raised/beveled edge
- Same wood tones as gavel

---

### 3. Law Book (Thick Legal Tome)
**Dimensions:** 32x32 pixels

A thick hardcover law book, closed.

**Must include:**
- Thick spine visible (book at slight angle)
- Dark leather cover (burgundy, navy, or dark green)
- Gold text/decoration on spine (simplified to 2-3 pixel lines)
- Visible pages (cream/white edge)

**Colors:**
- Cover: #800020 (burgundy) or #191970 (navy)
- Gold detail: #FFD700, #DAA520
- Pages: #FFFAF0, #F5F5DC

---

### 4. Briefcase
**Dimensions:** 32x32 pixels

A professional leather briefcase/attach√© case.

**Must include:**
- Rectangular leather case
- Handle on top
- Two metal clasps/latches (gold or silver)
- Slight 3D depth (top-down view showing top surface)

**Colors:**
- Leather: #8B4513, #654321 (brown) OR #1A1A1A, #2F2F2F (black)
- Metal clasps: #FFD700 or #C0C0C0
- Highlights: Lighter leather tone

---

### 5. Nameplate / Desk Plaque
**Dimensions:** 48x16 pixels (wider than tall)

A desk nameplate like "JUDGE" or just blank wood/metal plate.

**Must include:**
- Rectangular plate (brass, wood, or marble)
- Angled stand/base
- Optional: Simple text "JUDGE" in 3-pixel tall font

**Colors:**
- Brass: #B8860B, #DAA520, #FFD700
- OR Wood: #8B4513, #654321
- Text: #1A1A1A or #800020

---

### 6. Stack of Papers / Case Files
**Dimensions:** 32x32 pixels

A messy stack of papers/documents on a desk.

**Must include:**
- Multiple sheets slightly offset (showing depth)
- Some papers at angles
- Cream/white paper colors
- Optional: Manila folder underneath

**Colors:**
- Paper: #FFFAF0, #FFFFFF, #F5F5DC  
- Folder: #DEB887, #D2B48C
- Shadows: #C0C0C0

---

## DALL-E Prompts

### Gavel:
```
Pixel art sprite of wooden judge's gavel hammer, 32x32 pixels, transparent background, top-down 3/4 RPG view, dark brown wood, LPC Liberated Pixel Cup style, 1-pixel dark outline, limited 12-color palette, no anti-aliasing, lying flat on desk, clean pixel edges
```

### Gavel Block:
```
Pixel art sprite of circular wooden gavel sound block, 32x32 pixels, transparent background, top-down 3/4 RPG view, dark wood with beveled edge, LPC style, 1-pixel outline, limited 8-color palette, no anti-aliasing
```

### Law Book:
```
Pixel art sprite of thick closed law book legal tome, 32x32 pixels, transparent background, top-down 3/4 RPG view, dark burgundy leather cover with gold spine text, LPC Liberated Pixel Cup style, 1-pixel outline, limited 12-color palette, no anti-aliasing
```

### Briefcase:
```
Pixel art sprite of leather briefcase attache case, 32x32 pixels, transparent background, top-down 3/4 RPG view, brown leather with gold metal clasps, LPC style, 1-pixel dark outline, limited 10-color palette, no anti-aliasing
```

### Nameplate:
```
Pixel art sprite of brass desk nameplate plaque, 48x16 pixels, transparent background, top-down 3/4 RPG view, gold brass metal on angled stand, LPC style, 1-pixel outline, limited 8-color palette, no anti-aliasing
```

### Paper Stack:
```
Pixel art sprite of messy stack of papers documents, 32x32 pixels, transparent background, top-down 3/4 RPG view, white cream paper with manila folder, LPC style, 1-pixel outline, limited 10-color palette, no anti-aliasing
```
